org.gvsig.raster.swing.impl.canvas.layer.function

Class DefaultStraightLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.swing.gcanvas.DrawableElement
      • org.gvsig.raster.swing.impl.canvas.layer.function.DefaultBaseFunction
        • org.gvsig.raster.swing.impl.canvas.layer.function.DefaultStraightLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFunction, StraightLine
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultDensitySlicingLine, DefaultLogaritmicExponentialLine, DefaultSquareRootPowLine

    public class DefaultStraightLine
extends DefaultBaseFunction
implements StraightLine
    Representa una linea recta con puntos de arrastre para la ecualización de un histograma y realce lineales y dencity slicing.
